channel.title: Getting this error when I spawn in a custom item
channel.description:
I don't understand why I'm getting this:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 65545 at Stream.method421(Stream.java:187) at Model.<init>(Model.java:180) at Model.method462(Model.java:115) at ItemDef.method201(ItemDef.java:419) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:318) at client.drawInterface(client.java:6976) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1432) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:6833) at client.processDrawing(client.java:7461) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:102) at client.run(client.java:3805) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)[/code]
Any help would be appreciated.

item.title: Getting this error when I spawn in a custom item
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

I don’t understand why I’m getting this:

Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 65545 at Stream.method421(Stream.java:187) at Model.<init>(Model.java:180) at Model.method462(Model.java:115) at ItemDef.method201(ItemDef.java:419) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:318) at client.drawInterface(client.java:6976) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1432) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:6833) at client.processDrawing(client.java:7461) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:102) at client.run(client.java:3805) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)

Any help would be appreciated.
